name: Desert Combat Mission 2017
description: If you are courageous enough to fight and shoot your enemies, then this Desert Combat Mission 2017 game is best shooting game ever. In this modern shooting competition you are equipping with the latest new sniper shooting guns aiming at the terrorists are rooming on the different places. Do you love FPS (first person shooting) games? If yes, then test your shooting skill and shoot down the enemies are capture cover the hilly areas. Completely enemy killing and gun shooting based for fans of hot shooting with stylized stunning graphics and realistic thrilling environments. You can also feel the real amazing weapon shooting affective sound on this commando  mission.
